analysis.description:
Lotthereum.closeRound (/unique_chucks/11/0x5a2a454675c1b659caa58b5675ee759b992b84b1.sol#200-219) is declared view but changes state variables:
	- Lotthereum.games
	- Lotthereum.balances

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/11/0x5a2a454675c1b659caa58b5675ee759b992b84b1.sol#223-224:
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/11/0x5a2a454675c1b659caa58b5675ee759b992b84b1.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.11 (/unique_chucks/11/0x5a2a454675c1b659caa58b5675ee759b992b84b1.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_a' of Lotthereum.getNumber (/unique_chucks/11/0x5a2a454675c1b659caa58b5675ee759b992b84b1.sol#225) is not in mixedCase
